PathOfBuilding.Notes:
Early Splitting/Shattering Steel + Onslaught + Chance to Bleed Warbanner Dash/Leap Slam + Faster Attacks Ancestral Something + Maim
Mid Act 2 Earthshatter + Fist of War + Melee Physical Damage + Fortify + Brutality + Ruthless Intimidating Cry + Rallying Cry + Enduring Cry + Second Wind Pride Herald of Purity Dread Banner Blood and Sand Vaal Ancestral Warchief + Leap Slam + Maim + Faster Attacks Berserk Blood Rage
Solo Maps Any Steel skill
